author: hwright
msg: * www/merge-tracking/design.html
(design-log): Clarify the relationship between children and parent nodes when
using the receiver interface.

author: dlr
msg: * subversion/bindings/swig/svn_client.i
Use the MERGEHASH typemap, which converts "apr_hash_t **mergeinfo"
output parameters into the appropriate Python or Ruby data type, for
Python in addition to Ruby.

author: djames
msg: * STATUS: Veto r24497.

author: djames
msg: Update autogen.py to use a more portable linking scheme, which will
hopefully work on Mac OS X.
* autogen.py
(get_apr_config): Specify library names in linker form, so that we can
depend on the linker to find out the full name of libraries. Also set
the library_path according to the apr and svn prefixes.
(): Set LIBRARY_PATH so that the gcc linker can pick up the libraries
from the desired locations. Remove unnecessary code which strips the
prefix from the generated python libraries.

author: pburba
msg: Fix svn_wc__path_switched() bug which falsely reported some paths as switched.
Specifically, wc_path was reported as switched if its base name wasn't URI
safe.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/util.c
(svn_wc__path_switched): Base name of wc_path used to create URL may
require URI encoding.
